results.abstract: New ABC series Lost is serious look at societal development among survivors of plane crash; photos (M)

headline.main: If We're Not Being Rescued, Let's All Start New Lives

results.snippet: WHEN ABC executives approached J.J. Abrams about making a series centered on plane crash survivors marooned on a distant atoll, he knew the concept could work for a mini-series -- but a whole season of episodes?     ''When I first heard the idea, I...
results.lead_paragraph: WHEN ABC executives approached J.J. Abrams about making a series centered on plane crash survivors marooned on a distant atoll, he knew the concept could work for a mini-series -- but a whole season of episodes? ''When I first heard the idea, I wasn't interested at all,'' he confessed.
